text.jpText:
桐生院トレーナーとハッピーミークの間に、
不穏な気配が漂ってしまっていた。
text.enText:
There was a disturbing feeling of uneasiness 
between Kiryuin trainer and Happy Meek.

text.jpText:
同じ栄冠を目指すものとして、
放ってはおけない――
text.enText:
As we are all aiming for the same crown, we 
can't just leave her there.

text.jpText:
彼女たちの和解にひと役買い、
いずれライバルになるかもしれない存在の
成長を目の当たりにするのだった。
text.enText:
I played a role in their reconciliation and 
witnessed the growth of a being who might 
eventually become their rival. who may 
eventually become their rivals.

text.jpText:
そして桐生院トレーナーから、お礼として
ウマ娘育成の極意が記された秘伝書、
『トレーナー白書』を受け取った。
text.enText:
As a token of appreciation, the trainer 
Kiryuin gave me a copy of the "Trainer's 
White Paper," a secret book containing the 
secrets of Uma Musume training. The 
"Trainer's White Paper," a secret book 
containing the secrets of training Uma 
Musume, was received as a gift.

text.jpText:
桐生院家のトレーナー白書。
そこに記されたウマ娘育成の極意は
<chrname>の成長に大いに貢献した！
text.enText:
The Kiryuin Family Trainer's White Paper. The 
maxims of Umamusume training described in it 
contributed greatly to <chrname>'s growth!

text.jpText:
彼女たちの和解にひと役買い、
いずれライバルになるかもしれない存在の
成長を目の当たりにするのだった。
text.enText:
I played a role in their reconciliation and 
witnessed the growth of a being who might 
eventually become their rival. who may 
eventually become their rivals.
